alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Yakutat (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 10 at 2:34PM AKST until February 11 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...MORE SNOW FOR PARTS OF THE NORTHERN PANHANDLE TONIGHT... Snow is expected again overnight Friday night. Petersburg has been dropped from the advisories as of this update due to temperatures expected to be too warm for significant snowfall. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. * WHERE...City and Borough of Yakutat. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 6 AM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact evening travel. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A change to rain is expected early Saturday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
